WORKDONE:

Ok took the dvd9 and ripped it,but the video was nice but had faults...colours slightly
off,video noise etc...
So made a .avs dropped into vdub and used brightness,contrast,rgb eq,smoother HQ,resize,
sharpen and fixed it so it looked good too me
Audio i stripped hives and remuxed to my encode....so syncing etc..is thanks to them.
